Text.Page: The effect of potion suddenly faded in the heart of enemy territory, but <PCNAME> escaped swiftly, defeating enemies along the way.
(Hagand's invisibility potion has worn off! The Parthians can see youâ€”and they don't look happy about it!)

I talked to Hagand, and he told me that he'd given you an invisibility potion. Didn't you bother with it?

Typical ! No wonder everyone's always talking about you!

Did you get the Relativity Stones?"Got about a dozen of them."
